channel.title: Bank Button

item.title: Bank Button
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

I am trying to add the button in your bank where you click it and your items go into your bank. I don’t need any help source sided its just that the button isn’t appearing on the bank interface…

what my bank looks like with that code added and compiled :
http://gyazo.com/a51f075a1549dcac7d703e8d1c93bf49

public static void configureBank(TextDrawingArea[] TDA) {
		RSInterface Tab = addTabInterface(23000);
		addText(23003, "", TDA, 0, 0xFFB000, true, true);
		addHoverButton(23004, "Bank/CHAR", 3, 21, 21, "Close", 3, 25005, 0);
		addHoveredButton(23005, "Bank/CHAR", 2, 21, 21, 23006);
		addHoverButton(23007, "Bank/BANK", 5, 35, 25, "Close", 4, 25008, 0);
		addHoveredButton(23008, "Bank/BANK", 6, 35, 25, 23009);
		
		Tab.children = new int[7];
		Tab.childX = new int[7];
		Tab.childY = new int[7];
		Tab.children[0] = 5292;
		Tab.childX[0] = 0;
		Tab.childY[0] = 0;
		Tab.children[1] = 23003;
		Tab.childX[1] = 410;
		Tab.childY[1] = 30;
		Tab.children[2] = 23004;
		Tab.childX[2] = 472;
		Tab.childY[2] = 27;
		Tab.children[3] = 23005;
		Tab.childX[3] = 472;
		Tab.childY[3] = 27;
		Tab.children[4] = 23007;
		Tab.childX[4] = 450;
		Tab.childY[4] = 288;
		Tab.children[5] = 23008;
		Tab.childX[5] = 450;
		Tab.childY[5] = 288;
		
		Tab.children[6] = 23008;
		Tab.childX[6] = 3000;
		Tab.childY[6] = 5000;
		RSInterface rsi = interfaceCache[5292];
		addText(5384, "Close bank", TDA, 0, 0xFFB000, true, true);
		rsi.childX[90] = 410;
		rsi.childY[90] = 288;
	}
